amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funds for border security fencing, infrastructure and technology by $10 million, offset by a reduction of a similar amount in funding for the Office of the Under Secretary for Management.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for the Office of the Under Secretary for Management and increase funds for U.S. Customs and Border Protection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCaul amendment (A012) Failed by voice vote.
